title: Injunction to restrain violation
context: [ยง339-10] Injunction to restrain violation. In addition to the remedies provided in this chapter, the director may apply to the circuit environmental court for a temporary or permanent injunction restraining any person from violating any provision of this chapter. [L Sp 1977 1st, c 2, pt of ยง2; am L 2014, c 218, ยง8.]
